seo.title: YakShaver developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a YakShaver Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a YakShaver certified developer!

pageBlocks.ParentContainerDescription: We recommend that each organization have a certified YakShaver Admin. Upon successful completion of the below steps, your organization will receive 50 credits (valued at $25).

CardAndImageItem.Description: In your YakShaver portal, add a project called 'Playground' and set the backlog to this public GitHub repo: [https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground](https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground)
Set up an additional recording tool following the docs. (LINK)

Do a test Shave into that project. In your Shave, explain to us:

* How you have set up your screen capture tool.
* Which project to send your Shave to.
* The project's location in the portal, and it's backlog.
* Where does the video go after being recorded?
You will receive an email from us with instructions to claim your 50 credits.

pageBlocks.title: Admin Certification
pageBlocks.ctaDescription: We recommend that each organization has a certified YakShaver Admin. Upon successful completion your organization will receive 50 free credits valued at $25.

featureItem.headline: Instructions
featureItem.text:
1\. In your YakShaver portal, add the YakShaver playground project:
[https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground](https://github.com/SSWConsulting/SSW.YakShaver.Playground)

2\. Do a test Shave into that project. In your Shave, explain to us:

\- How you set up the tool you are using (Teams, snipping tool, etc.).

\- Which project to send your Shave to.

\- Show the project in your portal, and show it has a backlog.

\- Where does the video go after being recorded?

That's it! You will receive an email with instructions to claim your 50 credits.
